INSIDE_GUIDE_MSG_01:
Head west to reach the Monolith
Head south to reach the Underwater Tunnel
INSIDE_GUIDE_MSG_02: The Underwater Tunnel is up ahead!
REC_POINT_ICE_16_2: ̄A device that will activate Masters Road for those who wish to improve their riding technique.
INSIDE_GUIDE_MSG_03:
Head North to reach East Polar Park
Head South to reach the Iron Ark
CORD_REC_02:
There was data in the container!
Received secret data of the Grim Tundra!
OUTSIDE_GUIDE_MSG_01: Nothing is written on the back.
OUTSIDE_GUIDE_MSG_02: Prepare a ride before jumping into the water!
OUTSIDE_GUIDE_MSG_03: Only friends of Silver welcome from here onwards!
OUTSIDE_GUIDE_MSG_04: Nothing is written on the back.
OUTSIDE_GUIDE_MSG_05: Nothing is written on the back.
REC_POINT_ICE_05_2: ̄This man-made transporter is connected to the Darkiron Bastille.
MINE_02_MSG: Use the Transportation Device to visit Spirit Road?Ă
CHILDREN_D_MSG_001:
́The boss wanted me to check up on you. It looks like you got the new Underwater Ride ability.
ā
Now, it's time to go to East Polar Park. First, head back the way you came, and then dive into the lake.
ā
MINE_04_MSG: Would you like to use the Transportation Device to reach the Darkiron Bastille?Ă
MINE_04_MSG_2: The Transporation Device is offline. You won't be able to use it at this time.
DONT_USE_TRANSFER_010: The Transporation Device is offline. You won't be able to use it at this time.
DOOR_MSG_000: ̂Your Reactor is not authorized to unlock this door.
ICE_NPC_REC: ̄Self-confident minion of Toto. He is in charge of protecting the monolith.
NPC_TODO_CHILD_REC: ̄A minion and loyal subject to Toto. It would do literally anything to make him happy.
REC_POINT_ICE_12_2: ̄A giant lake that covers half of the Grim Tundra. It has a network of connected tunnels deep below.
DEMO_001_AFT_BC:
́Hey, you can't! My boss says no one can use it!
ā
Just go home before you injure youself! You'll live a longer life if you follow the rules!
DEMO_004_AFT_BC:
́The Boss said you'd be comin'. Exclusive trainin' place for Monster Masters, eh?
ā
An' here I had no idea what I was guardin' this whole time. Oh hoh hoh!
CHILDREN_D_MSG_002:
́Within the lake you'll see glowing stone landmarks. 
If you follow those, you'll find the tunnel's entrance.
ā
Once you reach the tunnel, East Polar Park should be right on the other side.
DEMO_005_AFT_BC:
́There are glowing stones in the water, beneath the tundra. Lucia is the who originally placed them there.
ā
She was being considerate so no one would get lost underwater. 
Use them to help guide your way.
GIM_BOX_REC_01:
̄I'm detecting a form of life, from inside of the box.
Would you like to see what's inside?Ă
GIM_BOX_REC_02: The monster in the container started an attack!
GIM_BOX_REC_03: ̄There is an item in this container. Would you like he open it?Ă
REC_POINT_DRONE_HOLE_02: ̄It looks hollow inside. You can check it out using the drone.
REC_POINT_ICE_01_2:
̄Attuning to this Zoom Stone will add it to your destination list.
These stones appear in various places around the world.
REC_POINT_ICE_02_2: ̄Space-travel device leading Monster Masters to the Virtual Colosseum.
REC_POINT_ICE_03_2: ̄This man-made transporter is connected to the Spirit Road.
REC_POINT_ICE_04_2:
̄A celestial body that exists in the center of the world. 
There is no more data on it.
REC_POINT_ICE_06_2:
̄Large ships that can travel between stars, and are carrying lots of humans at once.ā
This particular ship seems to have broken on impact from an emergency landing.
REC_POINT_ICE_07_2: ̄A once legendary and fearsome creature that dominated the Grim Tundra.
REC_POINT_ICE_08_2: ̄The only village in the Grim Tundra. It's located in a cave created from a hollowed out chunk of ice.
REC_POINT_ICE_09_2:
̄A crashed spacecraft. which monsters often refer to as the Iron Ark.ā
Offically named the "Star Dragon 1", it can travel across our galaxy with ease.
REC_POINT_ICE_10_2: ̄Polar Park's youth like jumping from this point as a display of courage to one another.
REC_POINT_ICE_11_2: ̄Due to the thickness and softness of the icy walls, it seems like a suitable place to rest for a bit.
REC_POINT_ICE_13_2:
̄A portion of a glacier, eroded by the natural water source beneath it.
Fairies are frequently seen playing in these springs.
REC_POINT_ICE_14_2:
̄A cave used by pirates who once inhabited this land. 
It used to be their main hideout.
REC_POINT_ICE_15_2: ̄A frozen tree was chopped up to make this sign. Be careful out in the Grim Tundra, or else you'll end up frozen, just like it!
MINE_HUKUROU_MSG: A Nochora is frozen by a spell.
REC_POINT_HUKUROU_BEFORE: ̄ The Ra Function is reacting to the target very strongly! Activate Ra Function to unmask target.
REC_RA_DOOR_011:
̄A door leading to another world. It was discovered
by in the Mirror of Ra's reflection, which shows the truth.
REC_RA_DOOR_030: They don't appear to have any significance at this time...
REC_RA_MONS_MES:
̄An Insurgent Demon transformed by Mother's
rampage. It has an frightening amount of power.
